Telework Project Management Plan

Project Management

GitHub Repository Setup

  • Create a repository for the project.
  • Set up branch protection rules for the main branch.
  • Integrate with project management tools (e.g., Redmine).

Project Planning

  • Define milestones and tasks.
  • Assign tasks to team members (if applicable).
  • Set up a timeline for project completion.

Django VM Server Setup

Apache HTTP Server Configuration

  • Install Apache HTTP Server.
  • Configure virtual hosts for development and production environments.

Mod_wsgi Configuration

  • Install and configure mod_wsgi for Apache to serve Django applications.

Django Settings File Configuration

  • Configure settings for different environments (development, production).
  • Set up static and media file handling.

PostgreSQL Configuration

  • Install PostgreSQL.
  • Configure databases and users.

PostGIS Configuration

  • Install PostGIS extension for PostgreSQL.
  • Configure spatial databases.

Geospatial Libraries

  • Install and configure GEOS, PROJ.4, and GDAL for geospatial operations.

Firewall Configuration

  • Set up firewall rules to secure the server.

REDIS Installation and Configuration

  • Install REDIS for caching and session management.
  • Configure REDIS for Django.

VM Configuration for Dev and Prod Servers

  • Set up separate environments for development and production on a single VM.

Airgap Considerations

  • Plan for deploying and updating the application in an airgapped environment.

Red Hat Security Considerations

  • Apply Red Hat security updates and patches.
  • Configure SELinux policies.

Software Versioning and Updates

  • Implement a strategy for tracking and updating software dependencies.

Logging Configuration

  • Set up standardized logging for debugging and monitoring.

Centurion Application Development

Application Organization

  • Plan the overall structure of the Django project and apps.

Scenario App

  • Design models for scenarios and related data.
  • Implement CRUD operations for scenarios.
  • Develop UI for scenario management.

Support Data App

  • Design models for supporting data (e.g., locations, commands).
  • Implement data management interfaces.

Form Design and Custom Widgets

  • Design forms for data input and editing.
  • Develop custom widgets for specific fields (e.g., location picker).

Simulation Considerations

  • Research libraries and tools for enhancing simulation speed.
  • Implement algorithms for orbital calculations and radar visibility.

Unclassifying the Project

  • Develop a strategy for separating sensitive code and data.
  • Ensure that the application can be easily adapted for use in secure environments.

Frontend Development

  • Review current HTML/JavaScript libraries.
  • Consider using HTMX and Alpine.js for dynamic interfaces.

Testing and Deployment

Unit Testing

  • Write unit tests for models, views, and other components.

Integration Testing

  • Test the integration of different parts of the application.

Deployment Planning

  • Plan the deployment process for both development and production environments.

Documentation

  • Document the setup process, application usage, and development guidelines.

Maintenance and Updates

Monitoring

  • Set up monitoring tools to track application performance and errors.

Updates

  • Regularly update the application and dependencies to address security vulnerabilities and bugs.

User Feedback

  • Implement a system for collecting and addressing user feedback.
